text: The Jerusalem Cinematheque is a cinematheque and film archive in Jerusalem. It opened in 1973. In 1981, it moved to its present location in Derech Hevron, near the walls of the old city of Jerusalem. The Israeli Film Archive, the national film archive of Israel was moved to the new building at the same time. == Other websites == * Jerusalem Cinematheque & Israel Film Archive Official website Category:Buildings and structures in Jerusalem Category:Theatres Category:1973 establishments in Asia Category:1970s establishments in Israel
title: Jerusalem Cinematheque
